Reviews.Title: Very short range
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera hoping to be able to install it about 25 feet from the receiver. Installation was very easy and I found a spot where I could plug in the camera transformer and still be able to get a good angle of view. However, I was never able to get a stable picture. I used the tuning knob but that didn't stop the picture from flickering constantly. I tried moving the camera and transmitter to new locations. Nothing worked. The units were not near other electronic equipment (other than the small monitor). The only time I could get a steady picture was when the camera and the receiver were within six feet of one another. In my opinion, the camera is totally useless.

Reviews.Title: it's decent
Reviews.Author: William Sandifer "William"
Reviews.Content: If you don't expect much then this is the product for you. The resolution is shaky and works best in great sunlight but hey..you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Neat little monitor cam
Reviews.Author: J. Mclin "Marana Jack"
Reviews.Content: Neat little gadget for the price.  Resolution is similar to a phone camera, good color, some focus adjustment, very small and compact cam, but range for interruption free reception is best within 30 ft.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT ONLY IF RANGE IS LESS THAN 50 FT.
Reviews.Author: Arthur Yellin "Arthur J Yellin"
Reviews.Content: STEEL APT DOORS IN NYC ARE A MAJOR NEGATIVE. GREAT RESOLUTION. I USE WITH EASY "GOTCHA" SECURITY SOFTWARE FOR 8 YEARS. a KNOCKOUT COMBO!

Reviews.Title: Stay at home Mom
Reviews.Author: Stay at home Mom
Reviews.Content: Seems to work well when stationed.Nice picture quality.The sound seems to pick up well.I'm returning it because I needsomething with night vision.That's the only flaw I had time withthe product to take note of.

Reviews.Title: cheap price but good item
Reviews.Author: frank plybon jr
Reviews.Content: Works good ,  highly recommend it item has a nice tuner so you don't have to adjust has great picture quality audio quality

Reviews.Title: Works great for the money
Reviews.Author: Chris T. Fuller "Chris1165"
Reviews.Content: This isn't the most top quality HD product on the market.  I wish people would stop being so hard on the quality.  It works great for the money.  I was surprised because after reading the reviews, I was expecting bad reception.  It is line-of-site so keep that in mind.  When in doubt, use the AC adapter that's provided.

Reviews.Title: Nice for close video's in a temporary location
Reviews.Author: Gaigemc
Reviews.Content: I get a ok.... kinda, signal from an unobstructed line of 40 feet, but put a wall in between and you loose signal fast. 20 feet and one wall, great signal. Also I could never get the unit to run off the battery for more than a few min's. you can go back unplug the battery and plug it right back in and it works a short time again. Also not sure why but this unit gets very hot (this is probably why battery doesn't run it long). I didn't know unit came with a built in mic til it got here. I find mic is really hit or miss. Sometimes you hear things others it's just static. I'd say it is good for temp, close range surveillance that has a power source. Also the base is not the one pictured it is much flimsier and you have to bend the frame (Not hard) to install the screws. Unless this is on sale, get something else.

Reviews.Title: Extremly satisfied
Reviews.Author: Sherlon Collinsworth
Reviews.Content: Very discreet and easily set up.Used in basement and picture is great. Sound however is something to be desired.Also does not recommend using with an extension cord however when first placed, I had to use one and had no problems with the picture that was transmitted.

Reviews.Title: Watch out!
Reviews.Author: Leonard K.Green
Reviews.Content: Useful to use when you want to watch over your stuff. Excellent device that you can put any where. Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Image quality is very poor
Reviews.Author: Robert Allen Clatworthy
Reviews.Content: Even at the proper distances the image is ver distorted, I never even tested the motion detection function due to the poor image. I do not recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: luv it
Reviews.Author: Gaven Genoff
Reviews.Content: very nice fast ship and works great ty . . . . .. . . .  .. . . . .

Reviews.Title: these are so amall and verstile. can be mounted in some strage places ! always be informed within the law
Reviews.Author: East Coast Treasures
Reviews.Content: I bought several of thee for mt company. some of my fellow workers wanted me to mount them in smoke detectors cigarette pack even a remote controlled plane for a photographer arial...he made big bugs getting arial shots for new hotels and bizs..rec highly Ill bebuying 50 more to mount...Oh I even mounted one in my little boys bob the builder..they are that small

Reviews.Title: ooooooooooooooooookkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkk
Reviews.Author: Manoj Mariadhasan Baby
Reviews.Content: it is good however not to be expected so much from it.manoj
